statements.select: SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName , AA.ViewID , AA.ButtonID , AA.UseYn , AA.LinkViewID FROM dbo.TViewButton AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName , AA.ViewID , AA.ButtonID , AA.UseYn , AA.LinkViewID FROM dbo.TViewButton AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ViewID = #ViewID# AND AA.ButtonID = #ButtonID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TViewButton ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, ViewID, ButtonID, UseYn, LinkViewID ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #ViewID#, #ButtonID#, #UseYn#, #LinkViewID# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TViewButton SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName= #UpdatedByName#
, ViewID = #ViewID# , ButtonID = #ButtonID# , UseYn = #UseYn# , LinkViewID = #LinkViewID# WHERE ID = #ID#
